quote.author: Martin Luther
quote.body: I shall never be a heretic; I may err in dispute, but I do not wish to decide anything finally; on the other hand, I am not bound by the opinions of men.

quote.author: Ayn Rand
quote.body: I don't build in order to have clients. I have clients in order to build.

quote.author: Dalai Lama
quote.body: I have always had this view about the modern education system: we pay attention to brain development, but the development of warmheartedness we take for granted.

quote.author: Octavio Paz
quote.body: Solitude is the profoundest fact of the human condition. Man is the only being who knows he is alone.

quote.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky
quote.body: The degree of civilization in a society can be judged by entering its prisons.

quote.source: Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back
quote.context: Immediately after Vader cuts Luke's hand off with a lightsaber on Bespin, The Cloud City
quote.author: Darth Vader , Luke Skywaker
quote.body:
Vader: "There is no escape. Don't make me destroy you. Luke, you do not yet realize your importance. You've only begun to discover your power! Join me, and I will complete your training. With our combined strength, we can end this destructive conflict, and bring order to the galaxy."

Luke: "I'll never join you!"

Vader: "If only you knew the power of the Dark Side. Obi-Wan never told you what happened to your father."

Luke: "He told me enough. He told me you killed him."

Vader: "No. I am your father.

quote.author: Plato
quote.body: One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.

quote.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote.body: It takes a long time to bring the past up to the present.

quote.author: Kinae Peterkin
quote.body: I want to ask for help but why ask if there will be consequences

quote.author: Benjamin Disraeli
quote.body: In a progressive country change is constant; change is inevitable.

quote.author: Nelson Mandela
quote.body: Sometimes, I feel like one who is on the sidelines, who has missed life itself.

quote.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote.body: When you play, play hard; when you work, don't play at all.

quote.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quote.body: The first requisite of a good citizen in this republic of ours is that he shall be able and willing to pull his own weight.
